Subject: Congratulations! You’ve Won $1,000,000!
Body: Dear Winner, You have been selected as the lucky winner of our annual lottery. Claim your $1,000,000 prize by clicking this link: [malicious-link.com] Hurry! Offer expires soon.

Subject: FREE iPhone 15 for the first 100 users!
Body: Get your FREE iPhone 15 now! Just enter your credit card details and shipping address here: [scam-link.com] Limited time offer! Act fast!

Subject: Work from Home & Earn $5000/Week!
Body: Hello, We have an exclusive job offer for you. Work from home and make $5000 per week! No experience needed. Just sign up here: [fraud-job.com]

Subject: Urgent: Your Account Will Be Suspended!
Body: Dear Customer, We noticed unusual activity in your bank account. To secure your account, please log in immediately using this link: [fake-bank.com] Failure to do so will result in account suspension.

Subject: Team Meeting Scheduled for Tomorrow
Body: Hello Team, Just a reminder that our meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM. Please review the agenda before the meeting.

Subject: Thank You for Subscribing to Our Newsletter
Body: Hello, Thank you for subscribing to our weekly newsletter. We hope you enjoy the latest updates and insights.

Subject: Family Trip to Hawaii – Let’s Plan!
Body: Hey everyone, I found some great deals for our Hawaii trip. Let’s finalize the dates and book the flights soon.

Subject: Your Monthly Internet Bill
Body: Dear Customer, Your monthly internet bill of $49.99 is due. Please make the payment before the due date to avoid service interruption.
